1. Hero (2015) - This is a historical action drama film based on the true story of An Jung-geun, a Korean- independence activist who assassinated Ito Hirobumi, the first Prime Minister of Japan and Resident-General of Korea in 1909.

This movie stars Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Maggie Cheung, Jet Li. It is directed by Zhang Yimou, who is known for his historical dramas.

2. Retribution (2011) - This is a crime drama film based on the true story of Monty, the owner of a group home for troubled teens.

This movie stars Earl Cameron, James Cromwell, Michael Sheen, Helen McCrory, Helen Mirren, Alex Jennings, Alex Jennings, Sylvia Syms, Sylvia Syms, Roger Allam, Roger Allam.

It is directed by Ken Loach, who is known for his social realism films.
